formattedAddress: 272 W 125th St #278, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 272 W 125th St #278, New York, NY 10027, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer stocking brand-name athletic & streetwear-inspired shoes, plus casual apparel.

originalText.text: Went there today to get my daughter fresh for the first day of school. The customer service is pretty good. If you pay by debit they have a paperless process though. I like my receipts in my hand so they get 4 stars but they're cool.

text.text: Went there today to get my daughter fresh for the first day of school. The customer service is pretty good. If you pay by debit they have a paperless process though. I like my receipts in my hand so they get 4 stars but they're cool.

originalText.text: At first I was upset because they held an outfit for me for my son birthday (same day) told them I'll be right back and they ended up selling the top to the outfit. After they said they would hold it for me BUT after talking with the manager; they found a store for me (out of my way) but hey they felt bad and they did everything they could to help me and accommodate for my babys birthday and on top of that gave me a discount and offered to pay my uber and they was very professional and I thank them for that and for understanding me ðŸ‘Œ

originalText.text: Prices are really really good. Brought 2 pants for the boy $48. No taxes . I said I going in but I don't think I can afford to pay for anything. But I admit I was wrong. Jackets are $138 not bad.  Not shabby, but nice. If the   boy  want take them off then the store is dope. I think that's the word the kids are using now. Take a look. thanks

originalText.text: Customer services is very annoying unprofessional as soon as you get into the store. When you respectfully inform them repeatly you dont need your help they follow you around the store. Stalking you and stereotyping ever move. When I go to the other locations it not like that because you put your store in Harlem they need more interpersonal culture training. When YOU speak  to the manager there no supervisory skills. The supervior is equal to the staff immature childish behavior. They cant handle any concerns . This store get a zero rating. i been going to this store since it open my parents  friends felt the same way.zero rating

originalText.text: When it comes to this store I have seen the worst customer service in my whole entire life. On release days they do not honor customers that have waited in that line for hours with patience and respect for store policy but in fact accommodate people who skip yell curse and break every boundary possible. I will never again visit west Harlem footaction or recommend any of this disgusting behavior shown today to anyone else. I am highly upset that I had to stand outside in the freezing cold from 6:30 to 10:00 in the 16th spot ans be skipped by a whole bunch of grown men left with number 047, no sneakers , frozens toes and treated horrible for trying to support the store and spend my hard earned money.The FOOTACTION employees witnessed the skipping and allowed more people to join the front of the line and did nothing.This store left a horrible taste in my mouth and I am glad to say I will never again return. I will share this story so people don't have to experience such disrespect and time wasted. I think this store should be checked out and re-evaluated on how they run things.
